topics.title: Beam Modes and Node Locations
topics.description: Understanding how the motion of the beam consists of contributions from distinct bending modes.
evidence_quotes: The first bending mode waves up and down, maybe like you'd expect. And then the second and third modes have slightly more complicated mode shapes.

topics.title: Controllability and Observability
topics.description: Understanding concepts of controllability and observability when analyzing systems with actuators and sensors.
evidence_quotes: So rather than adding a second sensor and actuator at a location that's ideal for the second mode, a cheaper alternative might be to just move the sensor and actuator to a place that can observe and control all of the critical bending modes.

topics.title: MATLAB Analysis
topics.description: Using MATLAB to analyze controllability and observability in systems with actuators and sensors.
evidence_quotes: They can help you think about the most effective places to add sensors and actuators, and to determine which states you should measure and which you should just estimate.

topics.title: Sensor and Actuator Placement
topics.description: Analyzing the effects of sensor and actuator placement on controllability and observability.
evidence_quotes: Well, with the exception that you can't place it at the tip of the beam due to other engineering constraints.
